numberOfDisposals.description:
The total number of property disposals submitted.

The value must be an integer between 1 and 99999999999.

assetDescription.description: A description of the asset being disposed of.

tokenName.description: The name of the crypotasset token.

acquisitionDate.description: The date the asset was acquired in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

disposalDate.description: The date that the asset was disposed of in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

disposalProceeds.description:
The total proceeds from the disposal of the asset. 

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowableCosts.description:
The total amount of allowable costs that can be deducted from the disposal proceeds. 

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsWithBadr.description:
The total amount of gains eligible for Business Asset Disposal Relief (BADR) before losses have been deducted. 

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsBeforeLosses.description:
The total amount of gains before losses have been deducted. 

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossesField.description:
The total allowable losses from the disposal.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

claimOrElectionCodesCryptoassets.description:
The claim, election or notice codes related to the disposal. 

Possible values are: 

* **GHO** - Gift Hold-Over Relief

* **ROR** - Rollover Relief

* **PRO** - Provisional Rollover Relief

* **NVC** - Negligible Value Claims

* **OTH** - Other claims

* **BAD** - Business Asset Disposal Relief

claimOrElectionCodesUnlistedShares.description:
The claim, election or notice codes related to the disposal. 

Possible values are: 

* **GHO** - Gift Hold-Over Relief

* **ROR** - Rollover Relief

* **PRO** - Provisional Rollover Relief

* **NVC** - Negligible Value Claims

* **ESH** - Employee Shares

* **OTH** - Other claims

* **BAD** - Business Asset Disposal Relief

* **INV** - Investors' Relief

* **EOT** - Employee Ownership Trust

amountOfNetGain.description:
The total amount of net gain from the disposal. Either gain or loss must be populated but not both.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountOfNetLoss.description:
The total amount of net loss from the disposal. Either gain or loss must be populated but not both.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rttTaxPaid.description:
The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for this disposal.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

assetType.description: The type of asset being disposed of.

companyName.description: The name of the company. Required for listed shares.

companyRegistrationNumber.description: The registration number of the company.

gainsWithInv.description:
The total amount of gains eligible for Investor's Relief (INV) before losses have been deducted.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

claimOrElectionCodesOtherGains.description:
The claim, election or notice codes related to the disposal. 

Possible values for listed shares are: 

* **GHO** - Gift Hold-Over Relief

* **ROR** - Rollover Relief

* **PRO** - Provisional Rollover Relief

* **ESH** - Employee Shares

* **NVC** - Negligible Value Claims

* **OTH** - Other claims

* **BAD** - Business Asset Disposal Relief

* **INV** - Investors' Relief

* **EOT** - Employee Ownership Trust

Possible values for non-uk residential property are:

* **PRR** - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief does not apply

* **LET** - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief applies

* **GHO** - Gift Hold-Over Relief

* **ROR** - Rollover Relief

* **PRO** - Provisional Rollover Relief

* **ESH** - Employee Shares

* **NVC** - Negligible Value Claims

* **OTH** - Other claims

* **BAD** - Business Asset Disposal Relief

* **EOT** - Employee Ownership Trust

Possible values for other property and other assets are:

* **PRR** - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief does not apply

* **LET** - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief applies

* **GHO** - Gift Hold-Over Relief

* **ROR** - Rollover Relief

* **PRO** - Provisional Rollover Relief

* **ESH** - Employee Shares

* **NVC** - Negligible Value Claims

* **OTH** - Other claims

* **BAD** - Business Asset Disposal Relief

* **INV** - Investors' Relief

* **EOT** - Employee Ownership Trust

anyOf.title: For other property and other assets

gainsReportedOnRtt.description:
The gains from this disposal reported through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for this disposal.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsExceedingLifetimeLimit.description:
The portion of gains exceeding the applicable lifetime relief limit.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsUnderSeis.description:
The gains eligible for Seed Enterprise Investment Scheme (SEIS) relief.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossUsedAgainstGeneralIncome.description:
The losses from this disposal applied against general income in the current tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

eisOrSeisReliefDueCurrentYear.description:
The Enterprise Investment Scheme (EIS) or Seed Enterprise Investment Scheme (SEIS) relief due for the current tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossesUsedAgainstGeneralIncomePreviousYe.description:
The losses applied against general income from the previous tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

eisOrSeisReliefDuePreviousYear.description:
The Enterprise Investment Scheme (EIS) or Seed Enterprise Investment Scheme (SEIS) relief due from the previous tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsFromExcludedSecurities.description:
The gains arising from excluded indexed securities.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gainsFromQahcBeforeLosses.description:
The gains from QAHC disposals before deducting any losses.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossesFromQahc.description:
The losses arising from QAHC disposals.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

attributedGains.description:
The total amount of all the attributed gains where personal losses cannot be set off.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

attributedGainsRttTaxPaid.description:
The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for all of the attributed interest gains.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherGainsField.description:
The total amount of any other asset type gains not reported elsewhere for the specified tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherGainsRttTaxPaid.description:
The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service on any other asset-type gains.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

broughtForwardLossesUsedInCurrentYear.description:
The total amount of brought forward losses used for the specified tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

setAgainstInYearGains.description:
The total amount of trading losses set against chargeable gains for the specified tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

setAgainstEarlierYear.description:
The total amount of losses set against general income for the tax year previous to the specified tax year.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossesToCarryForward.description:
The losses from this year to carry forward to future tax years.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustmentAmount.description:
The amount of included adjustments to reduce or increase the Capital Gains Tax payable.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lifetimeAllowanceBadr.description:
The lifetime allowance eligible for Business Asset Disposal Relief (BADR).

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lifetimeAllowanceInv.description:
The lifetime allowance eligible for Investor's Relief (INV).

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherGains.description: An array of other gains entries.

unlistedShares.description: An array of unlisted shares entries.

gainExcludedIndexedSecurities.description: Object containing details of gains from excluded indexed securities.

qualifyingAssetHoldingCompany.description: Object containing details of gains and losses from Qualifying Asset Holding Company (QAHC) disposals.

nonStandardGains2526.description: Object containing details of non-standard gains.

losses2526.description: Object containing details of Capital Gains Tax losses relating to other disposals and non-standard gains.

adjustments2526.description: Object containing details of Capital Gains Tax adjustment amounts.

lifetimeAllowance.description: Object containing lifetime allowance eligible for Business Asset Disposal Relief and Investors' Relief.

disposals.description: An array of other Capital Gains disposals.

assetType.description: The type of asset being disposed of.

assetDescription.description: A description of the asset being disposed of.

acquisitionDate.description: The date the asset was acquired in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

disposalDate.description: The date that the asset was disposed of in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

disposalProceeds.description: The total proceeds from the disposal of the asset. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

allowableCosts.description: The total amount of allowable costs that can be deducted from the disposal proceeds. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gain.description: The total gain from the disposal. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

loss.description: The total loss from the disposal. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

claimOrElectionCodes.description:
The claim, election or notice codes related to the disposal. Possible values are:\
`PRR` - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief does not apply\
`LET` - Private Residence Relief where Letting Relief applies\
`GHO` - Gift Hold-Over Relief\
`ROR` - Rollover Relief\
`PRO` - Provisional Rollover Relief\
`ESH` - Employee Shares\
`NVC` - Negligible Value Claims\
`SIR` - Social Investment Tax Relief\
`OTH` - Other claims\
`BAD` - Business Asset Disposal Relief\
`INV` - Investors' Relief

gainAfterRelief.description: The total net gain after any reliefs have been applied. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

lossAfterRelief.description: The total net loss after any reliefs have been applied. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

rttTaxPaid.description: The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for this disposal. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

nonStandardGains.description: One of these fields must be provided: carriedInterestGain, attributedGains or otherGains

carriedInterestGain.description: The total amount of all the carried interest gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

carriedInterestRttTaxPaid.description: The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for all of the carried interest gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

attributedGains.description: The total amount of all the attributed gains where personal losses cannot be set off. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

attributedGainsRttTaxPaid.description: The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service for all of the attributed interest gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherGains.description: The total amount of any other asset type gains not reported elsewhere for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherGainsRttTaxPaid.description: The total amount of tax paid through the Capital Gains Tax Real Time Transactions service on any other asset-type gains. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

losses.description: Details Capital Gains Tax losses relating to other disposals and non-standard gains. One of these fields must be provided: broughtForwardLossesUsedInCurrentYear, setAgainstInYearGains, setAgainstInYearGeneralIncome or setAgainstEarlierYear

broughtForwardLossesUsedInCurrentYear.description: The total amount of brought forward losses used for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

setAgainstInYearGains.description: The total amount of trading losses set against chargeable gains for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

setAgainstInYearGeneralIncome.description: The total amount of losses set against general income for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

setAgainstEarlierYear.description: The total amount of losses set against general income for the tax year previous to the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adjustments.description: The amount of included adjustments to reduce or increase the Capital Gains Tax payable. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
